title: CML Double Rocker Decorator Light Switch, Dual Single Pole Paddle in-Wall Switch, Self-grounding Electrical On/Off Interrupter, 15A 120V, UL Listed, 1 Pack, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #17,459 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #66 in Electrical Light Switches       #66 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement‚Ä∫Electrical‚Ä∫Switches & Dimmers‚Ä∫Wall Switches‚Ä∫Light Switches
feature_bullets: CML combo paddle rocker light switch is used to control dual devices from one location in a single gang box, space-saving
The impact-resistant thermoplastic design allows for a long service life and high performance in homes, offices, schools and other commercial & residential facilities
Features a self-grounding clip to automatically ground to the electrical box when installed, adding safety
Easy installation. Break-off plaster ears ensure flush alignment with the wall
UL Listed. 3-year replacement. Matching wall plates sold separately

customers_say: Customers find the light switch sturdy and easy to install, with one mentioning it worked well as a replacement for a broken switch. The product fits perfectly and customers appreciate its good price. They like its appearance.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks smooth, seems sturdy
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works great.Yeah it "clicks" when pushed, but Geeze, it doesn't say it's a silent switch, get over it you negative raters üòùPut the live (hot) wire on the tab side, the other 2 wires on the other side.Seems like a nice sturdy switch at a great price.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsdouble single pole switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Great when not having space for more than single gang box and needing to switch 2 separate lights

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDuel AC wall switch that fits in place of a single wall switch. No cover plate included.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Duel wall switch for lights and exhaust fan in bathroom or any other place you need a double switch in a single switch location.  Easy to wire, but does not include the cover plate.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works, good price hard to find item

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Switch worked great.  Easy to install and looks good.Any issues and I'll update my review.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe switch is a good price and fits well in the wall.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The price is good and the size is perfect for replacing two switches, thus allowing space for another switch or receptacle in the same box.
